 The wildly styled Eclipse Cross elevates the Mitsubishi brand which is why ours is priced so elegantly. Along with decent interior quality and surprising practicality, the Eclipse Cross is the company’s most polished product. One big plus for blooming families: A stroller fits easily in the cargo area with all the seats up. Extras: 5 Doors, Manual, Air conditioning, Airbag double and side, Alarm, Alloy wheels, Armrest, Auto lights, Central locking, Computer, Cruise Control, Electric mirrors and windows, Fog lights, IPOD and USB ready, Leather seats, Multi-function steering wheel, Rear Park distance control, Touchscreen Radio with Bluetooth.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. This newly launched Honda HR-V 1.5 Comfort CVT comes with a standard 5 years/200000km Warranty plan, a 5 years/200000km Service Plan, 4 years/60000km and a 3 years AA Roadside Assist. With an updated new look, the all-new Honda HR-V features a panoramic sunroof for all those great summer adventures, LED projector fog lights to help improve visibility even in the worst weather conditions, a hands-free power tailgate that will make storing luggage that much easier, and so much more. With clean lines and a sleek build, this is a car that can’t help but be noticed.

Please contact us to arrange a Taylor-made deal to match your pocket, trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. Finance is available with all the major banks as we are an approved dealer.

attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicle then look no further.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome.
We at Wingfield Motors Bellville strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. 
We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.
